description: AutoStream is a SaaS product that provides automated video editing tools for content creators.

pricing_plans.name: Pro Plan
pricing_plans.recommended_for: Professional content creators, YouTubers, and businesses

policies.title: Refund Policy
policies.description: Refunds are available within 7 days of purchase. After 7 days, no refunds will be issued. To request a refund, contact our support team with your order details.

policies.title: Support Availability
policies.description: 24/7 support is available exclusively for Pro plan subscribers. Basic plan users receive email support during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM EST, Monday to Friday).

policies.title: Cancellation Policy
policies.description: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellations take effect at the end of your current billing cycle. You'll retain access to all features until the cycle ends.

policies.title: Free Trial
policies.description: Both plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. Trial limitations: Basic plan features only, maximum 3 videos during trial period.

policies.title: Payment Methods
policies.description: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and wire transfers for annual subscriptions.

faq.question: What video formats do you support?
faq.answer: AutoStream supports all major video formats including MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, and WebM. We recommend uploading in MP4 format for best results.

faq.question: Can I upgrade from Basic to Pro anytime?
faq.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to Pro at any time. You'll be charged the prorated difference, and your billing cycle will remain the same.

faq.question: Do you offer annual plans?
faq.answer: Yes, annual plans are available with a 20% discount. Basic annual: $278/year, Pro annual: $758/year.

faq.question: Is there a limit on video length?
faq.answer: Basic plan: maximum 30 minutes per video. Pro plan: maximum 3 hours per video.
